item.title: Telegram bot on python
item.description: Introduction Once upon a time I had a need to for a telegram bot that will reposts news from external channels to my own channel to stay up-to-day with news from different sources in one place. Doing some short research, I didnâ€™t found suitable open-source script for my needs and I decided to write my own script on python. It is not ideal, but it works :-) There is a library called Telethon that makes easy to write python applications that can interact with Telegram.
